Class VideoService

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.service.VideoService
@Service public class VideoService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing videos within course modules.

Provides functionalities such as adding, removing, and updating videos, as well as retrieving videos based on their unique identifiers.

See Also:

  • ModuleItemService

  • Constructor Details

    • VideoService

      public VideoService()

  • Method Details

    • addVideoToModule

      public void addVideoToModule(User instructor, UUID moduleId, @Valid @Valid VideoDto dto)
      Adds a new video to a specified module.

      Creates a new Video entity from the provided VideoDto, associates it with the module, saves the video, and updates the module's items.

      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor adding the video
      moduleId - the unique identifier of the module to which the video will be added
      dto - the data transfer object containing video details

    • removeVideoFromModule

      public void removeVideoFromModule(User instructor, UUID videoId)
      Removes a video from a specified module.

      Finds the video by its ID, ensures the instructor is authorized to remove it, removes the video from the module's items, and deletes the video record.

      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor removing the video
      videoId - the unique identifier of the video to be removed
      Throws:
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the user is not the instructor of the course
      VideoNotFoundException - if the video is not found

    • updateVideo

      public void updateVideo(User instructor, UUID videoId, @Valid @Valid VideoDto dto)
      Updates an existing video with new details.

      Finds the video by its ID, ensures the instructor is authorized to update it, updates the video's details based on the provided VideoDto, and saves the updated video.

      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor updating the video
      videoId - the unique identifier of the video to be updated
      dto - the data transfer object containing updated video details
      Throws:
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the user is not the instructor of the course
      VideoNotFoundException - if the video is not found

    • findVideoByIdAsInstructor

      public Video findVideoByIdAsInstructor(User instructor, UUID videoId)
      Finds a video by its unique identifier as an instructor, ensuring authorization.
      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity representing the instructor
      videoId - the unique identifier of the video to find
      Returns:
      the Video entity corresponding to the provided ID
      Throws:
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the user is not the instructor of the course
      VideoNotFoundException - if the video is not found

    • findVideoById

      public Video findVideoById(User instructor, UUID videoId)
      Finds a video by its unique identifier, ensuring the user has access to its content.
      Parameters:
      instructor - the User entity requesting the video
      videoId - the unique identifier of the video
      Returns:
      the Video entity corresponding to the provided ID
      Throws:
      VideoNotFoundException - if the video is not found
      NotCourseInstructorException - if the user does not have access to the video content
